Summary: On my way home the other night I saw a UFO in the sky, and stopped along the highway to film it:
divs: sighting detailsdriving home from filming the sunset, i saw trianglular shaped object with orange lights. it was about 5:45. i first thought it was a ufo, because i'd never seen anything like that in the sky before. as i started filming, the lights faded in and out, and also one on the right moved south. all three lights faded out, then faded back in, then, as i said, the one on the right moved south. then, they all faded out. i was not scared, but rather intrigued. i still don't know if it's military, passenger jets, or alien. i actually never lost sight of the object, as they started to fade out. but it was cold, and i was on the highway and didn't want the cops to give me a ticket for standing on the side of the busy highway. i also happened to film the event. two sets of footage. you can watch them here: [links moved to fi section\cms\tg]
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around November 28th 2011
